meta.hint:
A subject pronoun tells who is doing something. It is usually at
the beginning of the sentence. The subject pronouns are I, you,
he, she, it, we, and they.
example I met Rick.
example They helped Stan.

An object pronoun comes after an action verb. The object
pronouns are me, you, him, her, it, us, and them.
example Rick met me.
example Stan helps them.
meta.question: Complete the sentence with the best pronoun.
